Jeremiah or Jeremias__35.1: The word that came to Jeremias from the Lord in the days of Joakim the son of Josias king of Juda, saying:
Jeremiah or Jeremias__35.2: Go to the house of the<u>Rechabites</u>: and speak to them, and bring them into the house of the Lord, into one of the chambers of the treasures, and thou shalt give them wine to drink.
Jeremiah or Jeremias__35.3: And I took Jezonias the son of Jeremias the son of Habsanias, and his brethren, and all his sons, and the whole house of the Rechabites.
Jeremiah or Jeremias__35.4: And I brought them into the house of the Lord, to the treasure house of the sons of Hanan, the son of Jegedelias the man of God, which was by the treasure house of the princes, above the treasure of Maasias the son of Sellum, who was keeper of the entry.
Jeremiah or Jeremias__35.5: And I set before the sons of the house of the Rechabites pots full of wine, and cups: and I said to them: Drink ye wine.
Jeremiah or Jeremias__35.6: And they answered: We will not drink wine: because Jonadab the son of Rechab, our father, commanded us, saying: You shall drink no wine, neither you, nor your children, for ever:
Jeremiah or Jeremias__35.7: Neither shall ye build houses, nor sow seed, nor plant vineyards, nor have any: but you shall dwell in tents all your days, that you may live many days upon the face of the earth, in which you are strangers.
Jeremiah or Jeremias__35.8: Therefore we have obeyed the voice of Jonadab the son of Rechab, our father, in all things that he commanded us: so as to drink no wine all our days: neither we, nor our wives, nor our sons, nor our daughters:
Jeremiah or Jeremias__35.9: Nor to build houses to dwell in, nor to have vineyard, or field, or seed:
Jeremiah or Jeremias__35.10: But we have dwelt in tents, and have been obedient according to all that Jonadab our father commanded us.
Jeremiah or Jeremias__35.11: But when Nabuchodonosor king of Babylon came up to our land, we said: Come, let us go into Jerusalem from the face of the army of the Chaldeans, and from the face of the army of Syria: and we have remained in Jerusalem.
Jeremiah or Jeremias__35.12: And the word of the Lord came to Jeremias, saying:
Jeremiah or Jeremias__35.13: Thus saith the Lord of hosts the God of Israel: Go, and say to the men of Juda, and to the inhabitants of Jerusalem: Will you not receive instruction, to obey my words, saith the Lord?
Jeremiah or Jeremias__35.14: The words of Jonadab the son of Rechab, by which he commanded his sons not to drink wine, have prevailed: and they have drunk none to this day, because they have obeyed the commandment of their father: but I have spoken to you, rising early and speaking, and you have not obeyed me.
Jeremiah or Jeremias__35.15: And I have sent to you all my servants the prophets, rising early, and sending and saying: Return ye every man from his wicked way, and make your ways good: and follow not strange gods, nor worship them, and you shall dwell in the land, which I gave you and your fathers: and you have not inclined your ear, nor hearkened to me.
Jeremiah or Jeremias__35.16: So the sons of Jonadab the son of Rechab have constantly kept the commandment of their father, which he commanded them: but this people hath not obeyed me.
Jeremiah or Jeremias__35.17: Therefore thus saith the Lord of hosts the God of Israel: Behold I will bring upon Juda, and upon all the inhabitants of Jerusalem all the evil that I have pronounced against them, because I have spoken to them, and they have not heard: I have called to them, and they have not answered me.
Jeremiah or Jeremias__35.18: And Jeremias said to the house of the Rechabites: Thus saith the Lord of hosts the God of Israel: Because you have obeyed the commandment of Jonadab your father, and have kept all his precepts, and have done all that he commanded you:
Jeremiah or Jeremias__35.19: Therefore thus saith the Lord of host the God of Israel: There shall not be wanting a man of the race of Jonadab the son of Rechab, standing before me for ever.
